text: Dughiar kamɨn, Atrivim Benhadat atrivir igharazir maba ko, uan averpenibar ikia dɨpar onganiba api. Ezɨ gumaziba Ahapɨn akam inigha iza a mɨgei. Ezɨ an akar kam baregha uan mɨdorozir gumazibav gɨa ghaze, e dɨkavigh mangɨ Samariaba ko mɨsogham. Egha me uan averpeniba ategha zui.20:12 Gumazir maba ghaze, Hibrun akam ves 12 ko ves 16ɨn itir Sukotɨn nguibar ekiam mɨgei. Ezɨ gumazir maba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, a mɨdorozir gumazibar averpenibav gei.
